* BrightBlade simply walked past Rex, watching him intently as passed and 
came up behind him.
She smiled as she simply lifted a delicate hand, gently brushing her fingers 
against the back of his neck as lightly as a breath of wind.
The voice silencer over her mouth creating a special effect.*

� Can�t see me, can you?�

* Her voice was soft, soothing, and echoed around the room like a holy 
chant. Making it so that it was impossible to locate its� original location.
BrightBlades fingers stroked over the back of Rex�s neck one more time 
before she took a step back, turning towards the sealed door gracefully.
But even as she took a few steps towards the door she noticed the sprinklers 
deactivate, putting out a hand to see if any water dropped onto the palm.
There wasn�t any.
But then, as BrightBlade was about to move closer to the door there was a 
sudden burst of flame as the throwers activated!
She cried out in alarm, backing up, her voice echoing through the room.
But, the reflective force field around her may not stop the flames, but it 
reflected them and thus looked like the entire fire filled the room.
BrightBlade looked at her weapon, reaching into her leg compartment and 
placing a special end onto the barrel.
She aimed carefully and fired�towards the wall.
A white ball of light exploded from her gun and hit the far wall, bouncing 
and struck the barrel�covering it with a plaster/gel.
That should fix that.
Now, for the rest.
BrightBlade aimed for different places on the wall, each bouncing off and 
hitting and barrel of the flame-throwers.
Now, with each gun unable to fire�she was safe from them.
For the moment.
She turned and looked towards Rex with a smile on her face, even though he 
couldn�t see it.*

� Naughty, naughty. I�m afraid you�ll have to do better then that.�
